name: Fleetling
description:
A part of a collection of mini games and demos around the topic "face blindness" - prosopagnosia - this is my attempt to visualise for outsiders how my brain processes faces. I see them... and then they are gone. Repeat exposure lets me remember them a bit longer, but i cannot properly long-term save the images. They disappear and I am left none the wiser. 

Made in Unity 2019.4.17f1. I might add music down the line but I'm challenging myself right now to work quickly.
